column4: sorry for being so persistent but we are a little desperate at this point...ï»¿anyone know anything 'bout nvidia geforce4 go drivers? nvidia geforce4 460go doesnt detect correctly on ubuntu 8.04LTS after installing with envyNG. We've tried a lot of searching but no success...
it's always best to use the standard ubuntu packages
DasEi: no, don't use nvidia downloads either.  Please use ubuntu packages.
